definitions.definition: An elementary particle that is classified as a lepton , and has an extremely small but nonzero mass and no electric charge . It interacts with the surroundings only via the weak force or gravitation , making it very difficult to detect.

main_definition: An elementary particle that is classified as a lepton , and has an extremely small but nonzero mass and no electric charge . It interacts with the surroundings only via the weak force or gravitation , making it very difficult to detect.
